gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 134, Nets 127
gameRecap.excerpt: The Trail Blazers defeated the Nets, 134-127, in overtime. Anfernee Simons led the way for the Trail Blazers with 38 points (5-10 3PT FG) and a career-high tying 11 assists, while Jerami Grant added 27 points and three 3PM in the victory. Mikal Bridges recorded 42 points (4-8 3PT FG), four rebounds and three assists for the Nets in the losing effort. The Trail Blazers improve to 10-25 on the season, while the Nets fall to 16-21.
